Checklist: Kiểm tra tự động chuyển đến tab EVM khi truy cập trang /txs
Title: Default tab selection when accessing transaction page
Description: Verify that when accessing the transactions page, EVM tab is automatically selected
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: The transactions page loads with EVM tab automatically selected

Checklist: Kiểm tra truy cập từ URL trực tiếp và từ navigation Blockchain / Transactions (actived khi đã chọn)
Title: Access transactions page through different navigation paths
Description: Verify that transactions page can be accessed through direct URL and navigation menu with correct active state
Test Steps: Navigate directly to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transactions page loads successfully

Test Steps: From homepage, click on Blockchain dropdown in the navigation menu
Expected Result: Dropdown menu appears with Transactions option

Test Steps: Click on Transactions option in the dropdown
Expected Result: User is navigated to the transactions page and Transactions item is highlighted as active in navigation

Checklist: Kiểm tra hiển thị đúng định dạng và số liệu "Completed txns" với tooltip "Number of transactions with success status"
Title: Completed transactions statistics display and tooltip
Description: Verify that Completed txns statistic is displayed correctly with proper tooltip
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: The page displays "Completed txns" statistic with a numeric value followed by "B" (billion)

Test Steps: Hover over the information icon next to "Completed txns"
Expected Result: Tooltip appears with text "Number of transactions with success status"

Checklist: Kiểm tra hiển thị đúng định dạng và số liệu "Total txs" với tooltip "All transactions including pending, dropped, replaced, failed transaction"
Title: Total transactions statistics display and tooltip
Description: Verify that Total txs statistic is displayed correctly with proper tooltip
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: The page displays "Total txs" statistic with a numeric value followed by "B" (billion)

Test Steps: Hover over the information icon next to "Total txs"
Expected Result: Tooltip appears with text "All transactions including pending, dropped, replaced, failed transaction"

Checklist: Kiểm tra chuyển đổi giữa tab EVM và Native SEI hiển thị đúng dữ liệu tương ứng
Title: Tab switching between EVM and Native SEI
Description: Verify that switching between EVM and Native SEI tabs shows corresponding data
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: EVM tab is selected by default showing EVM transactions

Test Steps: Click on the "Native SEI" tab
Expected Result: Tab switches to Native SEI and displays Native SEI transactions

Test Steps: Click on the "EVM" tab
Expected Result: Tab switches back to EVM and displays EVM transactions

Checklist: Kiểm tra tooltip Trx hash (i) hiển thị thời gian đồng bộ đúng định dạng "Last sync: DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SS UTC+XX:XX", múi giờ đúng với thiết bị người dùng và thời gian chênh lệch so với thời gian hiện tại tối đa là 30 giây
Title: Transaction hash tooltip displaying last sync time
Description: Verify that the tooltip for transaction hash shows correct sync time format, timezone and time difference
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction hash column is displayed with information icon

Test Steps: Hover over the information icon (i) next to "Trx hash"
Expected Result: Tooltip appears displaying "Last sync: DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SS UTC+XX:XX" format

Test Steps: Check the timezone in the tooltip
Expected Result: The timezone (UTC+XX:XX) matches the user's device timezone

Test Steps: Compare the displayed sync time with current system time
Expected Result: The time difference should not exceed 30 seconds

Checklist: Kiểm tra hiển thị thời gian của các giao dịch theo định dạng "X secs ago" (mới tạo), "1 min ago" (khoảng 1 phút), "X mins ago" (từ 2 phút trở lên) và tự động cập nhật khi thời gian thay đổi mà không cần refresh trang
Title: Relative time display for transactions
Description: Verify that transaction times are displayed in appropriate relative format and update automatically
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs and observe newly created transactions (less than a minute old)
Expected Result: Time is displayed as "X secs ago" where X is the number of seconds

Test Steps: Find a transaction that was created approximately 1 minute ago
Expected Result: Time is displayed as "1 min ago"

Test Steps: Find transactions created 2 or more minutes ago
Expected Result: Time is displayed as "X mins ago" where X is the number of minutes

Test Steps: Note the time of a newly created transaction, wait for 2 minutes without refreshing the page
Expected Result: The time display automatically updates from seconds to "1 min ago" and then to "2 mins ago"

Checklist: Kiểm tra hiển thị đầy đủ các cột: Trx hash, Status, Type & Method, Block, From/To, Value SEI, Fee SEI
Title: EVM tab transaction table columns
Description: Verify that EVM tab displays all required columns
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: EVM tab is selected by default

Test Steps: Check for presence of all required columns in the transaction table
Expected Result: The following columns are displayed: Trx hash, Status, Type & Method, Block, From/To, Value SEI, Fee SEI

Checklist: Kiểm tra hiển thị đúng định dạng và giá trị cho mỗi giao dịch trong bảng
Title: Transaction data format and values in EVM tab
Description: Verify that each transaction displays correct format and values in the EVM tab
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: Check the format and values for Trx hash column
Expected Result: Transaction hashes are displayed in hexadecimal format with correct copy icon

Test Steps: Check the format and values for Status column
Expected Result: Status shows either Success (green) or Error (red) with appropriate icon

Test Steps: Check the format and values for Type & Method column
Expected Result: Shows transaction type such as "Contract call" with parameter count like "+1" or "+2"

Test Steps: Check the format and values for other columns (Block, From/To, Value SEI, Fee SEI)
Expected Result: All values are displayed in appropriate format

Checklist: Kiểm tra các biểu tượng trạng thái (Success/Error) hiển thị chính xác theo kết quả giao dịch
Title: Transaction status icons
Description: Verify that transaction status icons correctly reflect the transaction outcome
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: Find transactions with successful status
Expected Result: Success status is displayed with green checkmark icon

Test Steps: Find transactions with error status
Expected Result: Error status is displayed with red error icon

Checklist: Kiểm tra bảng trong tab Native SEI không hiển thị cột From/To
Title: Native SEI tab column structure
Description: Verify that the Native SEI tab transaction table does not display From/To column
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: EVM tab is selected by default

Test Steps: Click on the "Native SEI" tab
Expected Result: Native SEI transaction table is displayed

Test Steps: Check the columns in the Native SEI transaction table
Expected Result: From/To column is not present in the table

Checklist: Kiểm tra hiển thị thông báo "Notes: As part of data retention policies, /seiprotocol.seichain.oracle.MsgAggregateExchangeRateVote transactions are pruned once they exceed a three-month threshold."
Title: Native SEI data retention policy note
Description: Verify that Native SEI tab displays the data retention policy note
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: EVM tab is selected by default

Test Steps: Click on the "Native SEI" tab
Expected Result: Native SEI transaction table is displayed

Test Steps: Check for presence of data retention policy note
Expected Result: Note is displayed with text: "Notes: As part of data retention policies, /seiprotocol.seichain.oracle.MsgAggregateExchangeRateVote transactions are pruned once they exceed a three-month threshold."

Checklist: Kiểm tra hiển thị đúng định dạng và giá trị cho mỗi giao dịch trong bảng Native SEI
Title: Transaction data format and values in Native SEI tab
Description: Verify that each transaction displays correct format and values in the Native SEI tab
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: EVM tab is selected by default

Test Steps: Click on the "Native SEI" tab
Expected Result: Native SEI transaction table is displayed

Test Steps: Check the format and values for Trx hash column
Expected Result: Transaction hashes are displayed in hexadecimal format with correct copy icon

Test Steps: Check the format and values for Status column
Expected Result: Status shows Success with green checkmark icon

Test Steps: Check the format and values for Type & Method column
Expected Result: Shows transaction type such as "Transaction"

Test Steps: Check the format and values for other columns (Block, Value SEI, Fee SEI)
Expected Result: All values are displayed in appropriate format

Checklist: Kiểm tra khi nhấn vào transaction hash, hệ thống chuyển đến trang chi tiết giao dịch với URL có dạng https://seitrace.com/tx/{hash}
Title: Navigation to transaction details page
Description: Verify that clicking on a transaction hash navigates to the transaction details page
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: Click on a transaction hash in the Trx hash column
Expected Result: User is navigated to transaction details page with URL format https://seitrace.com/tx/{hash}
Test Data: Example: If clicking on hash 0x33d3f10ce2cfa..., URL should be https://seitrace.com/tx/0x33d3f10ce2cfa...

Checklist: Kiểm tra khi nhấn vào block, hệ thống chuyển đến trang chi tiết block với URL có dạng https://seitrace.com/block/{blockID}
Title: Navigation to block details page
Description: Verify that clicking on a block number navigates to the block details page
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: Click on a block number in the Block column
Expected Result: User is navigated to block details page with URL format https://seitrace.com/block/{blockID}
Test Data: Example: If clicking on block 142,644,560, URL should be https://seitrace.com/block/142644560

Checklist: Kiểm tra chức năng copy khi nhấn vào biểu tượng copy bên cạnh các giá trị
Title: Copy functionality for transaction data
Description: Verify that clicking on copy icons correctly copies the associated values
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: Click on the copy icon next to a transaction hash
Expected Result: Transaction hash is copied to clipboard successfully

Test Steps: Click on the copy icon next to an address in From/To column
Expected Result: Address is copied to clipboard successfully

Checklist: Kiểm tra khi nhấn vào địa chỉ có icon address (EOA), hệ thống mở trang address details với tag EOA
Title: Navigation to EOA address details
Description: Verify that clicking on an EOA address navigates to address details page with EOA tag
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: In the From/To column, identify an address with EOA icon (regular wallet address)
Expected Result: Address is displayed with appropriate EOA icon

Test Steps: Click on the EOA address
Expected Result: User is navigated to address details page with EOA tag selected

Checklist: Kiểm tra khi nhấn vào địa chỉ có icon contract, hệ thống mở trang với tiêu đề "Contract details"
Title: Navigation to contract details
Description: Verify that clicking on a contract address navigates to contract details page
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: In the From/To column, identify an address with contract icon
Expected Result: Address is displayed with appropriate contract icon

Test Steps: Click on the contract address
Expected Result: User is navigated to contract details page with title "Contract details"

Checklist: Kiểm tra contract chưa verify hiển thị icon màu xám với tooltip "contract"
Title: Unverified contract icon and tooltip
Description: Verify that unverified contracts display gray icon with correct tooltip
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: In the From/To column, identify a contract address that is not verified
Expected Result: Contract is displayed with gray contract icon

Test Steps: Hover over the gray contract icon
Expected Result: Tooltip appears with text "contract"

Checklist: Kiểm tra contract đã verified hiển thị icon màu xanh lá với tooltip "Verified contract"
Title: Verified contract icon and tooltip
Description: Verify that verified contracts display green icon with correct tooltip
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: In the From/To column, identify a contract address that is verified
Expected Result: Contract is displayed with green contract icon

Test Steps: Hover over the green contract icon
Expected Result: Tooltip appears with text "Verified contract"

Checklist: Kiểm tra contract là proxy và đã verified hiển thị icon xanh lá proxy với tooltip "Verified proxy contract"
Title: Verified proxy contract icon and tooltip
Description: Verify that verified proxy contracts display green proxy icon with correct tooltip
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: In the From/To column, identify a proxy contract address that is verified
Expected Result: Contract is displayed with green proxy contract icon

Test Steps: Hover over the green proxy contract icon
Expected Result: Tooltip appears with text "Verified proxy contract"

Checklist: Kiểm tra contract proxy chưa verify hiển thị icon màu xám proxy với tooltip "Proxy contract"
Title: Unverified proxy contract icon and tooltip
Description: Verify that unverified proxy contracts display gray proxy icon with correct tooltip
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: In the From/To column, identify a proxy contract address that is not verified
Expected Result: Contract is displayed with gray proxy contract icon

Test Steps: Hover over the gray proxy contract icon
Expected Result: Tooltip appears with text "Proxy contract"

Checklist: Kiểm tra hiển thị số lượng item bổ sung dưới dạng +1, +2 khi có nhiều hơn 1 item
Title: Multiple method indicators in Type & Method column
Description: Verify that transactions with multiple methods display appropriate indicators
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: Look for transactions with multiple method calls in the Type & Method column
Expected Result: Additional methods are indicated with "+1", "+2" etc. depending on the number of additional methods

Checklist: Kiểm tra khi nhấn vào +1, +2, hiện popup hiển thị chính xác các tags bị ẩn
Title: Method popup display on indicator click
Description: Verify that clicking on method indicators shows popup with hidden tags
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: Find a transaction with "+1" or "+2" indicator in Type & Method column
Expected Result: Additional method indicator is visible

Test Steps: Click on the "+1" or "+2" indicator
Expected Result: Popup appears showing all hidden tags/methods

Test Steps: Verify the content of the popup
Expected Result: All hidden methods are displayed correctly in the popup

Checklist: Kiểm tra giá trị Fee SEI được làm tròn đến 6 chữ số
Title: Fee SEI value rounding
Description: Verify that Fee SEI values are rounded to 6 decimal places
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: Examine the Fee SEI column values
Expected Result: All Fee SEI values are rounded to 6 decimal places

Checklist: Kiểm tra khi hover vào giá trị Fee SEI, hiển thị đầy đủ giá trị không bị làm tròn
Title: Fee SEI full value on hover
Description: Verify that hovering over Fee SEI values shows full unrounded values
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: Hover over a Fee SEI value in the Fee SEI column
Expected Result: Tooltip appears showing the full unrounded value of the fee

Checklist: Kiểm tra nút "First" bị vô hiệu hóa khi đang ở trang đầu tiên
Title: First button disabled state
Description: Verify that First button is disabled when on the first page
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: The first page of transactions is displayed

Test Steps: Check the state of the "First" pagination button
Expected Result: The "First" button is disabled (grayed out or not clickable)

Checklist: Kiểm tra nút "Previous" bị vô hiệu hóa khi đang ở trang đầu tiên
Title: Previous button disabled state
Description: Verify that Previous button is disabled when on the first page
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: The first page of transactions is displayed

Test Steps: Check the state of the "Previous" pagination button
Expected Result: The "Previous" button is disabled (grayed out or not clickable)

Checklist: Kiểm tra nút "Next" hoạt động chính xác khi chuyển đến trang tiếp theo
Title: Next button functionality
Description: Verify that Next button navigates to the next page correctly
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: The first page of transactions is displayed

Test Steps: Note the transaction data on the current page
Expected Result: Transaction data is visible and can be referenced

Test Steps: Click on the "Next" pagination button
Expected Result: The second page of transactions is loaded with different transaction data

Checklist: Kiểm tra nút "Previous" hoạt động chính xác khi chuyển về trang trước đó
Title: Previous button functionality
Description: Verify that Previous button navigates to the previous page correctly
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: The first page of transactions is displayed

Test Steps: Click on the "Next" pagination button
Expected Result: The second page of transactions is loaded

Test Steps: Note the transaction data on the current (second) page
Expected Result: Transaction data is visible and can be referenced

Test Steps: Click on the "Previous" pagination button
Expected Result: The first page of transactions is loaded again with the original transaction data

Checklist: Kiểm tra nút "First" hoạt động chính xác khi quay về trang đầu tiên từ bất kỳ trang nào
Title: First button functionality
Description: Verify that First button navigates to the first page correctly from any page
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: The first page of transactions is displayed

Test Steps: Click on the "Next" pagination button multiple times to navigate to a page beyond the second page
Expected Result: A page beyond the second page is loaded

Test Steps: Click on the "First" pagination button
Expected Result: The first page of transactions is loaded with the original transaction data

Checklist: Kiểm tra số trang hiện tại hiển thị chính xác
Title: Current page number display
Description: Verify that the current page number is displayed correctly
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: The pagination area shows "1" as the current page

Test Steps: Click on the "Next" pagination button
Expected Result: The pagination area updates to show "2" as the current page

Test Steps: Click on the "Next" pagination button again
Expected Result: The pagination area updates to show "3" as the current page

Test Steps: Click on the "Previous" pagination button
Expected Result: The pagination area updates to show "2" as the current page

Checklist: Kiểm tra không có nút "Last" trong phân trang
Title: Absence of Last page button
Description: Verify that there is no Last page button in the pagination
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: The pagination controls are visible

Test Steps: Check all pagination controls
Expected Result: There is no "Last" button present in the pagination controls

Checklist: Kiểm tra thời gian tải trang ban đầu không quá 3 giây
Title: Initial page load time
Description: Verify that the transactions page loads within 3 seconds
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs while measuring the load time
Expected Result: The page fully loads and becomes interactive within 3 seconds

Checklist: Kiểm tra thời gian tải khi chuyển tab giữa EVM và Native SEI không quá 2 giây
Title: Tab switching load time
Description: Verify that switching between EVM and Native SEI tabs takes less than 2 seconds
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: EVM tab is selected by default

Test Steps: Click on the "Native SEI" tab while measuring the load time
Expected Result: The Native SEI tab content loads within 2 seconds

Test Steps: Click on the "EVM" tab while measuring the load time
Expected Result: The EVM tab content loads within 2 seconds

Checklist: Kiểm tra giao diện hiển thị đúng trên các kích thước màn hình khác nhau (responsive)
Title: Responsive design across screen sizes
Description: Verify that the transactions page displays correctly on different screen sizes
Test Steps: Open https://seitrace.com/txs on a desktop browser and resize the window to different widths
Expected Result: The page layout adjusts appropriately to different window sizes

Test Steps: Open https://seitrace.com/txs on a tablet device or emulator
Expected Result: The page displays correctly with appropriate layout for tablet screen size

Test Steps: Open https://seitrace.com/txs on a mobile device or emulator
Expected Result: The page displays correctly with appropriate layout for mobile screen size

Checklist: Kiểm tra thời gian phản hồi khi nhấn vào transaction hash hoặc block không quá 3 giây
Title: Transaction and block navigation response time
Description: Verify that navigation to transaction or block details occurs within 3 seconds
Test Steps: Navigate to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed with multiple transactions

Test Steps: Click on a transaction hash while measuring the response time
Expected Result: Navigation to transaction details page occurs within 3 seconds

Test Steps: Navigate back to https://seitrace.com/txs
Expected Result: Transaction table is displayed again

Test Steps: Click on a block number while measuring the response time
Expected Result: Navigation to block details page occurs within 3 seconds

Checklist: Kiểm tra trang hoạt động đúng trên các trình duyệt phổ biến (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
Title: Cross-browser compatibility
Description: Verify that the transactions page works correctly across different browsers
Test Steps: Open https://seitrace.com/txs in Google Chrome
Expected Result: The page displays and functions correctly

Test Steps: Open https://seitrace.com/txs in Mozilla Firefox
Expected Result: The page displays and functions correctly with the same appearance and behavior as in Chrome

Test Steps: Open https://seitrace.com/txs in Safari (if available)
Expected Result: The page displays and functions correctly with the same appearance and behavior as in Chrome and Firefox

Test Steps: Test basic functionality in each browser: tab switching, pagination, clicking on transaction hashes and blocks
Expected Result: All functionality works consistently across browsers
